name: 2021 the 11th International Conference on Communication and Network Security
content: Publication： Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees. The accepted paper will be included into ICCNS 2021 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. The ISBN number assigned to ICCNS 2021 is 978-1-4503-8642-5 (ICCNS 2021 论文集出版刊号)
